name: Jackimaniacs Fighting Jam
description:
Join Jack, Percy, Mario & Friends for their biggest fight yet.

Story: It was a normal day at Kingfisher School, and Jack was learning about fighting tournaments. He then had this idea that he would host his own tournament, but the rest of the children just laughed at him. But Jack was determined to host one, so he got to work making arrangements, stages and other things. By the time he was finished, most if not all the fighters he invited arrived. Jack knew that it was time to fight not only his loved ones, but his imaginary friends too. But who will win the golden cup once again?
